name: flickr.stats.getCollectionReferrers
description: Get a list of referrers from a given domain to a collection

arguments.name: api_key
arguments.description: Your API application key.See herefor more details.

arguments.name: date
arguments.description:
Stats will be returned for this date. This should be in either be in YYYY-MM-DD or unix timestamp format.

A day according to Flickr Stats starts at midnight GMT for all users, and timestamps will automatically be rounded down to the start of the day.

arguments.name: domain
arguments.description: The domain to return referrers for. This should be a hostname (eg: "flickr.com") with no protocol or pathname.

arguments.name: collection_id
arguments.description: The id of the collection to get stats for. If not provided, stats for all collections will be returned.

arguments.name: per_page
arguments.description: Number of referrers to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 25. The maximum allowed value is 100.

arguments.name: page
arguments.description: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.

response:
<domain page="1" perpage="25" pages="1" total="3" name="flickr.com">
  <referrer url="http://flickr.com/" views="11" />
  <referrer url="http://flickr.com/photos/friends/" views="8" />
  <referrer url="http://flickr.com/search/?q=stats+api" views="2" searchterm="stats api" />
</domain>

errors.title: User does not have statsThe user you have requested stats has not enabled stats on their account.
Invalid dateThe date provided could not be parsed
Collection not foundThe collection id was either invalid or was for a collection not owned by the calling user.
Invalid domainThe domain provided is not in the expected format.
SSL is requiredSSL is required to access the Flickr API.
Invalid signatureThe passed signature was invalid.
Missing signatureThe call required signing but no signature was sent.

Invalid API KeyThe API key passed was not valid or has expired.

Format "xxx" not foundThe requested response format was not found.
Method "xxx" not foundThe requested method was not found.
Invalid SOAP envelopeThe SOAP envelope send in the request could not be parsed.
Invalid XML-RPC Method CallThe XML-RPC request document could not be parsed.
Bad URL foundOne or more arguments contained a URL that has been used for abuse on Flickr.
